resources.string: Inserisci il tuo numero di telefono
Questo permesso è necessario per scattare una foto
Questo permesso è necessario per prendere una foto dalla Galleria
L\'immagine selezionata non è più disponibile
To start working you have to set your status to available.
You must have your network connection up in order to make your status visible online, otherwise the app will not working as expected!
To stop working you have to set your status to NOT available.

When you want to stop working it is important to remember to set your state to NOT available otherwise you will continue to receive delivery requeste and you MUST complete them. So for example when you are doing your last delivery you can already set your status to NOT available and in this way when you complete the current delivery you will not receive any request.
No delivery request at the moment. When you have a new request it will appear here. Remember to keep your connection up in order to be able to receive new requests.
CHECK your CONNECTION. Your status cannot be recovered now but it will be automatically recovered when your connection will be active.
Waiting for synchronization... Remember to keep your connection up!
Your status is set to NOT available. Turn your status on to start working.
The delivery cannot be completed because the code you\'ve inserted is wrong! Try again
You will be informed when your status has actually changed.
